choices: She was captured and forced to wear them
1.content: Why is she in diapers.
1.title: The first choice of many.

12.content:
Entering her room and closing the door behind her an exhausted Tigress collapsed on her bed mat, lying there as she caught her breath. After today's intensive training the feline warrior really need to unwind.

And she knew just how to do it to.

Getting up from the mat and removing a loose floorboard to get at her secret compartment Tigress removed a bag. Opening said bag revealed a large supply of diapers in her size, along with wipes and baby powder. Taking out one of the pair of padding and quickly unfolding it. Lifting it up to her face Tigress pressed her nose against the inside, inhaled the perfumed fragrance. Tail twitching in excitement she laid back down, removing her pants and panties. Threading her tail through the hole in the back she slipped the diaper under her rear. Sprinkling some powder over privates and the inside of the padding Tigress pulled the front up and secured the sides, doing up one tape then the other. Feeling the crinkly soft thickness now wrapped around her bottom the feline let out a purr of contentment, happy to be diapered.

Tigress didn't quite know why she liked diapers, having only recently developed a fondness for them in the last couple of months. Whatever the reason she was glad to have them back as she now had way to relax, albeit an unusual one. Continuing to lie on her bed Tigress reached down with her paw to feel the padded bulk between her legs, her thumb managing to find its way into her mouth as her eyes became half-lidded.

She then...
12.title: She likes them

123.content: Sucking her thumb in a blissful haze Tigress didn't hear the approaching footsteps, nor the unannounced opening of the door until it was too late. Her full awareness coming back to her Tigress looked up to see who entered, eyes widening in horror when she saw that she had been caught by none other than...
123.title: Gets caught by someone

13.title: She was captured and forced to wear them

152.content:
Tigress's eyes slowly start to open reveling the ceiling of her room. She slowly sat up "nightmare..again" she muttered to herself. The past several nights the master had been plagued by terrible dreams she could have handled the dreams just fine but unfortunately they brought another problem.

She thorugh off the covers to revile a large dark spot on the front off her pants and the familiar smell of urine. "Great just great. She said in a irritated tone. She began the familiar process of dealing with a wet bed. She stripped her clothes off and tossed them into a basket she kept for just that and did the same with her sheets. She warped a towel around herself grabbed a set of clothes and was about to go to the showers when...
152.title: She wets the bed.

choices: Continues to try and persuade her
1522.content:
Tigress froze when someone knocked on her door.

"Tigress, are you awake?"

Oh crap she thought as the person who knocked ended up being Master Shifu. Her eyes darted to the basket were her pee-stained clothes were. She couldn't let him find out about her bedwetting. "Yes Master I'm awake" Tigress replied as she knew she had to respond to him or else

"Ah good. May I come in, I wish to speak to you?" Shifu asked and Tigress immediately felt panic arise in her, "Actually, I don't think that's a good idea. I was about to go to the showers and I'm not decent" she said a bit too quickly and the other picked up on her tone. "Tigress is something wrong?" came Shifu's worried reply. "No...nothing's wrong" Tigress's panic was obvious this time and the master knew it too given his next words, "I'm coming in" he stated and before Tigress could stop him Shifu entered her room. The red panda sniffed at the air and automatically deduced what had happened, "Tigress...did you wet the bed?"

Sitting back down on her bed Tigress covered her face with her paws in shame, "Yes master" she muttered. Taking a seat beside Shifu gently got her to lower her paws, "Tigress it's okay, I'm not mad. Tell me about it." Slowly she explained waking up wet the past week and the recurring nightmares. When pressed about the bad dreams she revealed they were of her being a cub in the Bao Gu orphanage again and getting called a monster by the other kids. After explaining everything the red panda stroked his beard thoughtfully, "This dreams of yours sound troubling, and right now all we can do is hope they pass. In the meantime I suggest you wear some protection during the night so as to spare the sheets" he recommended.

"What do you mean by protection master?" Tigress asked though she was dreading the answer.

"I'm referring of course to you wearing a diaper" Shifu stated.

Tigress instantly shook her head, crossing her arms "I'm sorry master but the answer is no." There was no way she was wearing something as babyish as a diaper, even if it was just for the night.

Seeing how stubborn she was being Shifu...
1522.title: Someone knocks.

15223.content:
"Is wearing a diaper really so bad Tigress?" Shifu questioned the feline.

"Yes" she answered without hesitation, "Diapers are for babies and I'm a full grown woman. Not to mention the leader of the Furious Five, to wear such a thing would be unbecoming of a revered kung fu master such as myself."

"Um hm..." Shifu nodded, "And what would you say if I told you I wore diapers myself?"

"I'd say you were joking" Tigress replied, unable to even picture the wise old master in the infantile garment. Turns out she didn't need to as the red panda smirked before lifting the bottom of his robe up, revealing a diaper taped around his waist. Tigress's eyes widened to size of dinner plates, her jaw dropping faster than Crane's beak the moment she beheld Shifu's padded underwear. "Master...why are you wearing that?" she asked, suddenly unwilling to say the word.

Shifu then told her that he wore them because of...
15223.title: Reveals his own diaper?

152232.content:
"To put it simply, I enjoy wearing them" Shifu unabashfully replied then added, "And this may surprise you but I even use them, when I can get away with it that is" he admitted with a hint of a blush.

"B-but why?" Tigress stuttered out, still not believing any of what she was hearing.

The red panda sighed, "There are too many reasons as to why to properly explain. You have to experience wearing them for yourself in order to really understand. But I can tell you how it started." Shifu then revealed that after Tai Lung's imprisonment he fell into a deep depression, during which he one day happened across the snow leopard's old baby things. In a moment of curiosity he tried on one of his diaper, which fit him quite well due to his species short stature. A week later he bought his own supply of diapers and a month after that he started using them in secret. Shifu explained how over the years his fetish for the garments grew to the point where he started wearing them all the time, keeping them hidden underneath his robes.

"Now that you know my secret, do you still think diapers are just for babies?" he asked after the conclusion of his strange tale.

Not wanting to disrespect her master and still confused by discovery Tigress replied, "No...I guess not."

"Good, then you will wear one during bedtime until your nightmares go away?"

"Yes Master Shifu" Tigress complied.

"Excellent. I will have Zeng go down to the village and get some in your size. They will be delivered to your room before tonight" he promised before getting up to leave. However just as Shifu reached the door Tigress voiced another question, "Does Zeng know about-"

"My diapers?" Shifu finished for her, "He was the only one I told about it aside from Oogway."

And with that the red panda was gone leaving the feline alone to digest all that she had just learned about her master.
152232.title: Pleasure

1522321.content:
The day ended up passing by quickly for Tigress, though she was a little bit distracted during training. Now that she knew Shifu wore diapers she actually tried to see if she could discreetly spy the master's padding. Tigress hoped to catch a glimpse when he demonstrated some moves. Unfortunately Shifu was very careful not to allow anyone a view under his robes. Her strange curiosity to see Shifu's diaper again aside everything went as normal.

After dinner Tigress retired to her room to get ready for bed. Upon entering she discovered two packages waiting for her on the covers. Walking over to inspect them she found they contained the diapers Shifu had promised her along with some other supplies like wipes and powder. Spying a note on top of the packaging she picked it up and quickly read it.

Tigress,

Here are the diapers as promised. Make sure to change out of your used one as soon as you wake up as you don't want to risk diaper rash, trust me. Let me know if you run out and I will get you more.

P.S. I noticed you staring at my rear during training today. If you're that curious about them come to my room at eight. Just know that one of your teammates who shares the same fetish as me will be there as well.

Tigress was stunned at the last sentence. One of her friends and fellow comrades was into diapers too? Now that was something she just had to see. Tearing up the note and throwing it away in the trash she checked the time to see it was half past seven. Deciding to arrive early Tigress headed for the door only to pause and look back at the diapers sitting on her bed.
1522321.title: Later that night

15223212.content:
Tigress figured that it might appear rude to show up without one on. Or at least that's what the feline warrior told herself as an excuse as she wanted to sate her burning curiosity regarding the garments by trying one on now. Next thing she knew she was lying on her bed and tugging her pants down to remove them and her panties.

Kicking them both off Tigress grabbed a diaper from the pack, unfolding it and threading her tail through the hole in the back. Taking the bottle of baby powder she sprinkled some over her crotch and on her rear. Her breathing then quickened as she pulled the front of the diaper up between her legs, pressing it against her stomach as she did up the tape on either side. Once the diaper was secure Tigress felt a weird mix of emotions at the new slightly thick bulk between her thighs. Running her paws across the smooth plastic of the padding, her tail swayed and thumped against the bed. It was so strange to be back in a diaper again, something Tigress hadn't worn since she turned three.

Remembering the meeting with Shifu Tigress broke out of her thoughts and quickly put her pants back on, which managed to cover her diaper quite well. However if one looked closely they'd notice a bit of bulging around her crotch area. Lucky for her it was dark out so nobody would be able to see anyway. After hiding away the rest of the stuff Tigress quietly set off for the palace. The short trip out into the night was relatively silent save of the light crinkles her diaper made that the feline's keen ears picked up.

Reaching the door to Shifu's room with plenty of time to spare Tigress knocked, "Master, it's me. I'm here" she said slowly. Seconds later the door opened to reveal the red panda who she noticed had his robe undone revealing his diaper. "I'm glad you decided to join us Tigress, come inside" he ushered her into his room, the inside of which was lit up with dozens of candles.

"My friend is running late so go ahead and have a seat on the bed" Shifu told her. Doing as her master recommended Tigress sat down, her hidden padding letting out a crinkle. Shifu's ears twitched as his lips broke out into a smile, "I see you chose to wear a diaper for our get together, I'm glad" he nodded in approval. Tigress blushed but said nothing as she patiently waited for the mystery guest to arrive. That was the main reason she came, to find out which of them it was.

Finally after five minutes of waiting there came a knock at the screen door, Shifu pulling it open to reveal...
15223212.title: Puts one on

152232121.content:
The sight of the familiar black and white panda rendered Tigress speechless. Po was the other person in the palace who wore diapers? Well she had pegged him as the immature type so she shouldn't be too surprised.

"Sorry for being a little late Shifu, but Monkey really wanted to tell me some new jokes he came up with" Po apologized as he entered.

"It's quite alright" Shifu replied quickly closing the door behind him.

It was then that Po noticed they weren't the only ones in the room, spying Tigress of all people sitting on the bed.

"Wha!?...W-What's Tigress doing here?" Po asked immediately freaking out.

"Calm yourself Po, I asked her to come" the red panda quickly explained.

Doing as told Po relaxed though eyed Tigress suspiciously.

"But she's going to find out about our 'you know what'" he whispered behind his hand.

Shifu chuckled, "You can relax as she already knows about our diapers" he said unafraid to speak the word aloud, "Its the very reason I invited her here. Turns out Tigress has a slight bedwetting problem and has chosen to wear them until its solved. Unlike us she needs them" he clarified.

"Oh..." was all the panda said in response, feeling a little sympathetic to the feline.

"Now that that's settled Tigress you are free to go if you want, or you can choose to stick around. Keep in mind that if you decide to stay you'll end up seeing something that may be uncomfortable to watch. However I will expect you to be respectful and openminded despite whatever you happen to witness. That's means no teasing or judging anything that the two of us do. Am I clear?" Shifu said with a stern expression. While he had been laying out the rules the red panda had taken off his robes, leaving him in only his diaper.

"I understand master" Tigress replied.

Good. Now what is your decision?"

Thinking it over in her head she decided to...
152232121.title: Po

1522321211.content:
"I'm going to stay" she answered firmly.

Though Tigress appeared confident on the outside, on the inside she was worried about what she would learn tonight about her master and teammate.

Shifu nodded, "Very well. You may sit there or if you wish to you can participate."

The red panda then walked off to another part of the room as Po approached her. They both silently stared at one another unsure of what to say until Tigress broke the ice by speaking, "So you're also into diapers?" she asked.

"Y-Yeah" the panda nervously replied, averting his eyes slightly and fiddling with his fingers.

"How did you end up liking them if you don't mind me asking?" Tigress questioned, her curiosity returning.

Po was about to respond but Shifu beat him to it.

"I can tell you how it happened. The Dragon Warrior here came to my room one day to see me and chose to open the door without knocking first. Unfortunately I was undressed at the time so you can guess what he saw me in. Needless to say I was forced to explain myself, after which I punished Po by ordering him to come to my quarters in his downtime and put on a diaper for a couple of hours, once a day for an entire week. That was three months ago, and yet he is still wearing them" he finished his explanation with a teasing grin causing the panda's cheeks to turn red.

"I just really like being back in them" Po sheepishly admitted then muttered dejectedly. "Anyway now that you know you must think that I'm just a big baby."

Placing a comforting hand on the other's shoulder, "Actually I don't. The old me might have thought that, but I think you're pretty brave for telling me. Also you're my friend, I would never think you were a baby" Tigress assured him.

A weird look suddenly appeared on the panda's face before disappearing in the next second as Po nervously laughed.

"Heh heh, you uh might want to hold that thought."

She watched him walk over to a nearby cabinet wardrobe and open it. Tigress then saw Po take out the biggest diaper she had ever seen, wondering where he could even managed to find ones big enough to fit him. Taking off his shorts he quickly donned the enormous diaper by maneuvering it between his spread legs and taping up the sides. Though it was strange for her to see the Dragon Warrior wearing a diaper Tigress had to admit it did so of look kind of cute on him.

Meanwhile Po was grinning down at his new disposable underwear, his expression remaining unchanged even as he began...
1522321211.title: Stay

15223212112.content:
Tigress who had been watching the Dragon Warrior closely, noticed a change in Po's stance as the panda slightly bent his knees. Enough that his butt just stuck out but not enough that he was squatting. Confused as to why such a position was necessary her question was immediately answered when a bulge appeared in the back of his diaper. It started out small but grew slowly grew larger and more noticeable as the seconds passed. It took a moment for her brain to connect the dots, but when it did the realization hit her like a hard punch to the head.

Po was pooping in his diaper.

Normally such an act would revolt her but for some reason Tigress couldn't look away. Though out of the corner of her eye she could see Shifu watching as well. The red panda had a small grin on his face, clearly unperturbed by the fact his student was soiling himself right in front him. Focusing on the seat of the panda's padding Tigress saw it start to sag under the weight of the massive load being forced into it. A few seconds later Po finally finished going number two, straightening his legs as a small sigh escaped his lips.

"Whew! Looks like my pants just felt the full force of the thunder!" Po exclaimed loudly with a grin upon noting the sheer fullness of his garment strapped to his bottom. His grin turned sheepish when a powerful odor began to fill the air around him, the scent originating from the confines of his underwear. Only mildly embarrassed Po continued to smiled knowing what the smell represented, that he had a dirty diaper and required changing.

"Man, diapers are so awesome" he commented while rubbing the back of his stinky padding.

"Yes, and so are diaper changes" Shifu chuckled lightly while covering his nose at the pungent smell, "Speaking of which, do you want to get changed now or later?"

Po thought it over and decided he wanted to get changed...
15223212112.title: Pooping

152232121121.content: "I'd like to be changed now" Po replied, the excitement of sitting in his mess fading and being replaced with the desire to be cleaned up in the form of a change. Shifu nodded then smirked, "Very well, but is the Dragon Warrior a big enough boy to change his own diaper? Or does he need his master to do it for him?" he said talking down to the panda like he was a toddler. Hearing the baby talk come out of nowhere Tigress despite being creeped out found herself focused Po's answer which was to...
152232121121.title: Now

152232122.content: If not Po then was it Crane?
152232122.title: Someone else

15223212222.content: That just leaves Monkey and Mantis. So which one of them is it?
15223212222.title: Someone else
